title: Help, Thanks, Wow: The Three Essential Prayers
description:
Help, Thanks, Wow: The Three Essential Prayers by Anne Lamott
2012 | ISBN: 1594631298 | English | 112 pages | EPUB | 0.25 MB

New York Times-bestselling author Anne Lamott writes about the three simple prayers essential to coming through tough times, difficult days and the hardships of daily life.

Readers of all ages have followed and cherished Anne LamottÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s funny and perceptive writing about her own faith through decades of trial and error. And in her new book, Help, Thanks, Wow, she has coalesced everything she knows about prayer to these fundamentals.

It is these three prayers Ã¢â‚¬â€œ asking for assistance from a higher power, appreciating what we have that is good, and feeling awe at the world around us Ã¢â‚¬â€œ that can get us through the day and can show us the way forward. In Help, Thanks, Wow, Lamott recounts how she came to these insights, explains what they mean to her and how they have helped, and explores how others have embraced these same ideas.
